about_the_game:
Endless Nightmare: Never Awaken is a spine-chilling psychological horror game that challenges your courage and sanity. Players are trapped in a seemingly infinite stairwell, where every decision to ascend or descend could lead to safety, terror, or the unknown. This game blends atmospheric horror with survival mechanics, immersing players in an eerie and unpredictable environment.

As you climb higher, the darkness deepens, and the unsettling silence is broken by ominous whispers, flickering lights, and shadowy figures. The key to survival? Navigate through the escalating horrors by descending when danger looms or climbing back up when the coast is clear. But beware: the stairs never seem to end, and reality begins to blur.

Key Features

  • Endless Exploration: Navigate a looping stairwell that changes dynamically as you progress, creating a sense of both dread and discovery.

  • Dynamic Horror Events: Encounter randomized scares, from subtle audio cues to full-blown paranormal activity, ensuring no two playthroughs are the same.

  • Tension-Filled Gameplay: Decide when to move up or down and avoiding the dangers lurking in the shadows.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: High-quality graphics, haunting sound design, and a minimalist interface keep players fully engrossed.

Endless Nightmare: Never Awaken is perfect for players who crave immersive horror experiences and enjoy exploring the psychological depths of fear. Can you face the endless stairs, or will you succumb to the terrors waiting in the darkness?

  • OS: Windows 10 64bit

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
